<js>
a=result.match(/book\/([\d]+)\/[\d]+/)[1];
b=result.match(/book\/[\d]+\/([\d]+)/)[1];
"/novelsearch/novel/getdlist/?id="+a+"&num="+b+"&order=asc"
</js>
